general.name: apStarLSF
general.description: The apLSF store numerical LSFs, i.e. a 1D vector for each pixel position for the combined LSF in the apStar file, as well as Gauss-Hermite coefficients that represent this LSF.
general.naming_convention: apSLSF-.+-[0-9]{5}\.fits, where .+ (a.k.a. STARNAME) uniquely identifies each star and [0-9]{5} is the 5-digit MJD number of the last data included in the combined frames. There will also be a link, apLSF-STARNAME.fits to the latest combined frame.

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another
